# textLayoutSections

**Type Property**

The layout orientations for each section.

## Declaration

```swift
static let textLayoutSections: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
```

## Discussion

An [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/PropertyLists/OldStylePlists/OldStylePLists.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20001012-47205] containing [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDictionary] objects, each dictionary describing a layout orientation section. The dictionary can have two attributes: [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/TextLayoutSectionKey/orientation] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/TextLayoutSectionKey/range]. When there is a gap between sections, it’s assumed to have [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutManager/TextLayoutOrientation/horizontal].

## Getting document appearance keys

- **appearance**: The appearance of the document.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the document.
- **bottomMargin**: The bottom margin of the document.
- **defaultFontExcluded**
- **defaultTabInterval**: The default tab stop interval for the document.
- **excludedElements**: The HTML elements to exclude in generated HTML.
- **hyphenationFactor**: The hyphenation factor of the document.
- **leftMargin**: The left margin of the document.
- **paperMargin**: The paper margin of the document.
- **paperSize**: The paper size for the document.
- **prefixSpaces**: The number of spaces for indenting nested HTML elements.
- **rightMargin**: The right margin of the document.
- **topMargin**: The top margin of the document.
- **viewMode**: The view mode.
- **viewSize**: The view size.
